article.title: Cobham Wins NAVAIR AN/ALQ-99 Transmitter Contract
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: Cobham has been awarded a $46 million, firm fixed-price contract to manufacture AN/ALQ-99 low band transmitters for the U.S. Naval Air Systems Command (NAVAIR). The contract's initial procurement calls for 60 transmitters and an associated number of antenna assemblies.
